actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-539, by Mr. Bishop (UT).

The resolution makes in order as original text for the purpose of amendment the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 112-25. All points of order against the amendment in the nature of a substitute are waived.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 137.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 688.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 238 - 178 (Roll no. 381).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 175 (Roll no. 382).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2578) to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act related to a segment of the Lower Merced River in California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2578) to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act related to a segment of the Lower Merced River in California.

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2578) to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act related to a segment of the Lower Merced River in California, and for other purposes.
